page.title: 06Farming_Market Gardening
page.content: Mr.Wiseman is the market gardener at Muston. {Crops.}He grows grapes, raspberries, spring onions and peaches.The other crops are mainly salads, lettuce, tomatoes,carrots,cauliflowers and sweet peas.Mr.Wiseman was stringing the tomatoes when we visited. {Marketing.}He sells his foods in a shop in Belle Vue St,Filey. {Horticulture.}He gave the crops water only when it was sunny by a hose_pipe. He has about 8200 tomatoes in different green houses. He has some figs which grow to the size of a pear. When the peaches started to grow he gently hit the peaches with a rabbit's tail on a long stick.The ones he missed were small and they fell to the ground.They have one acre of land.
